title: Queue-Doges without LP-Loss in ranked ?
body:
Heyy Guys,
all you guys know the situation when people are already announcing they will troll in 
champselect or lock in  troll picks (Soraka Jungle for example) in ranked games.
Usually i dodge those games, because:
1.These games usually tilt me 
2.Games with trolls on your team usually are no fun
3.I lose way more lp of a loss than of a queue dodge
4.Most of these games end up with multiple people insulting each other 
Of course having a penalty for leaving champselect is needed, but I think you should 
get something like one or two penalty free dodges per day.
What I think this would help with:
1.It`s more fair to the players
2.Prevent toxic behavior and the "tilting" of players
I know this might lead to more dodged games and 
longer queue times, but i think if it`s only 1 "free" dodge 
per day, this wouldn`t affect the queue times this much.
What do you guys think about this?

replies.body:
Ist sicher lustig vorallem im Challanger Bereich wenn man einen LCS spieler im gegnerte hat eninfach die Select dogen.
Und dann dürfen alle wieder 30 Min auf ein game warten, wo dann der nächste dogen kann.

Zumal man sagen muss das man eh kaum einen LP verlust durchs dogen hat. Und sich selten wirklich Trolle in der Champselect befinden somit sind wird dich das beim climben nicht sonderlich aufhalten.
